ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Price_Posting', ISCHANGED(Status), TEXT(Status)='Closed', NOT( OR( INCLUDES(Compliance_Flagset__c, 'Price_Posting__Submission_Confirmation'), INCLUDES(Compliance_Flagset__c, 'Price_Posting__State_Manager_Approval') ) ) ), TRUE, FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A "Submission Confirmation" or "State Manager Approval" document is required to close a Price Posting Case
